content:
On the Plan-Net IG, I don't understand the difference between Logical Definition (CLD) vs Expansion.
For example:
Logical Defintion(CLD) vs
Expansion

Logical Definition matches the content of the JSON. Expansion doesn't match. @Gail Kocher @Lloyd McKenzie
I'd guess either that the NUCC code system in tx.fhir.org does not match the set of codes used to create the CLD, or there is a rendering error. What is different about the expand?

@Gail Kocher noticed that some of the codes in the Logical Definition are missing from the Expansion. For example:
101200000X Drama Therapist
@Robert McClure three new values were added to the code set and are effective April 1, 2021. I do not know how tx.fhir.org gets the updates?

Three new taxonomy codes were added to the code set, effective April 1, 2021:

Code Display

101200000X Drama Therapist
171400000X Health & Wellness Coach
342000000X Transportation Network Company
@Rob Hausam do you need me to look at this?
I can add the new codes, but then @Grahame Grieve will need to push the package update. Maybe that can be in place by the time they take effect on April 1?
ok let me know when you've added them
This issue fell off the radar for a bit - I'll see about getting that done (I'll try for tonight) and will let you know.
